channel.title: Current State of RevMetrix on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Current State of RevMetrix on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Backend - Current State
item.description: Progress of Backend Development Backend Architecture Web API - Client and Server The Web API is now capable of making client-server interactions and is being hosted on a Linux Ubuntu 20.04 cloud server through DigitalOcean. To deploy the API application, a plethora of different approaches to the task were conducted, but in the end it was easiest and most efficient to create a Docker image for the application, create a docker-compose file for the application’s Dockerfile, and transfer this file to the DigitalOcean droplet in which the only installations needed on the server were Docker and SQLServer.

item.description: Progress of Frontend Development Frontend Architecture Frontend User Interface Wireframes Local Testing Database Schema
